result.eng: We will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ga: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.orig: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.html: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn costas na soċraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.

result.eng: The accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ga: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.orig: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.html: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a ċeap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.html: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.eng: They offered him to pay his travel costs.
result.ga: Thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íoc
result.orig: Thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íoc
result.html: Thairg siad dó a chostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.
result.ponchtml: Ṫairg siad dó a ċostais taistil a íocThey offered him to pay his travel costs.

result.eng: The tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ga: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.orig: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuine
result.html: Ní íocfaidh an binse as costais dlí a thiteann ar dhuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.
result.ponchtml: Ní íocfaiḋ an binse as costais dlí a ṫiteann ar ḋuineThe tribunal will not pay for legal costs incurred by a person.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
